item.title: Formal Notice sent to U.S. Attorney Ismail Ramsey
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_1201_0800_ismail_ramsey_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code ยง 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 08, 2024, 12:01 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Ismail Ramsey (U.S. Attorney for the Northern District of California) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_1201_0800_ismail_ramsey_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Ramsey, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.S. Code ยง 4.
